mdRecord.dcterms:title: Oto-ophthalmoscope in case
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bausch & Lomb Optical Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: plastic (organic material); glass (material); metal; paper (fiber product) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The case is lined with blue velvet and has a blue ribbon on the inside of the lid which is marked "Bausch & Lomb." The metal clasp is broken. The case holds the battery (01787a); the head assembly (01787b); the otoscope (01787c) which is engraved "Arc-Vue U.S. Pat. 2,184,414"; one speculum (01787d); one light bulb (01787f); and Directions for Use with a tag from the University Book Store.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
